verses.verse: זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This סֵ֔פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer, [is] the book תּוֹלְדֹ֖ת <S%H8435><s%> tol-Dot of the generations אָדָ֑ם <S%H121><s%> 'a-Dam; of Adam בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom, In the day בְּרֹ֤א <S%H1254><s%> be-Ro created אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him that God אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, man בִּדְמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> bid-Mut in the likeness אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char Male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> u-ne-ke-Vah and female בְּרָאָ֑ם <S%H1254><s%> be-ra-'Am; created וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech he them and blessed אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra them and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמָם֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mam their name אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, Adam בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day הִבָּֽרְאָֽם׃ <S%H1254><s%> hib-Ba-re-'Am. when they were created ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> vay-Chi lived אָדָ֗ם <S%H121><s%> 'a-Dam, And Adam שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim and thirty וּמְאַת֙ <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'At an hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led and begat בִּדְמוּת֖וֹ <S%H1823><s%> bid-mu-To [a son] in his own likeness כְּצַלְמ֑וֹ <S%H6754><s%> ke-tzal-Mo; after his image וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name שֵֽׁת׃ <S%H8352><s%> Shet. Seth

וַיִּֽהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu Then יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> ye-mei- And the days אָדָ֗ם <S%H121><s%> 'a-Dam, of Adam אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> ho-li-Do he had begotten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֔ת <S%H8352><s%> Shet, Seth שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh were eight מֵאֹ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led and he begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַיִּֽהְי֞וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְמֵ֤י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei And all the days אָדָם֙ <S%H121><s%> 'a-Dam that Adam אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after חַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> Chai, age תְּשַׁ֤ע <S%H8672><s%> te-Sha' were nine מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mot. and he died ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> vay-chi- lived שֵׁ֕ת <S%H8352><s%> shet And Seth חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and five שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years וּמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'At hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H583><s%> e-Noosh. Enos

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> vay-chi- lived שֵׁ֗ת <S%H8352><s%> Shet, And Seth אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> ho-li-Do he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> e-Noosh, Enos שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' and seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years וּשְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַֽיְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> vay-Chi lived אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H583><s%> e-Noosh And Enos תִּשְׁעִ֣ים <S%H8673><s%> tish-'Im ninety שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֵינָֽן׃ <S%H7018><s%> kei-Nan. Cainan

Jared

Enoch

Methuselah

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-yit-hal-Lech walked חֲנ֜וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> cha-Noch And Enoch אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, God אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> ho-li-Do and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְתוּשֶׁ֔לַח <S%H4968><s%> me-tu-She-lach, Methuselah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led the father בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not. and daughters

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-yit-hal-Lech walked חֲנ֖וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> cha-Noch And Enoch אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; with God וְאֵינֶ֕נּוּ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ei-Nen-nu else כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. and he [was] not for God פ Peh
